about.title: About Melco
about.description: Leading provider of safety equipment in Saudi Arabia, committed to protecting workers and ensuring workplace safety.

content.paragraph1: Melco Safety Equipment has been at the forefront of workplace safety in Saudi Arabia for over 15 years. We specialize in providing high-quality personal protective equipment and safety solutions to industries across the Kingdom.
content.paragraph2: Our commitment to excellence, combined with our partnerships with world-leading manufacturers, ensures that we deliver products that meet the highest international safety standards while serving the unique needs of the Saudi market.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the first choice and trusted destination in the commercial sector by delivering innovative products and services that ensure the highest levels of workplace safety.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We strive to meet our clients' needs by providing high-quality safety products and services driven by innovation, efficiency, and an unwavering commitment to protecting lives.

founding.title: Company Foundation
founding.description: Established with a vision to transform workplace safety in Saudi Arabia, Melco has grown from a small safety equipment supplier to a leading provider of comprehensive safety solutions.

expertise.title: Industry Expertise
expertise.description: Our team brings decades of combined experience in safety engineering, risk assessment, and equipment selection across multiple industries including construction, manufacturing, oil & gas, and healthcare.

certifications.title: Certifications & Standards
certifications.description: All our products meet or exceed international safety standards including CE, ANSI, and EN certifications, ensuring maximum protection for workers.

team.title: Our Professional Team
team.description: Our team consists of certified safety professionals, engineers, and consultants dedicated to providing expert guidance and support.

Products.title: Safety Products
Products.description: Comprehensive range of safety equipment to protect workers in every industry. From head to toe protection, we have the solutions you need.
Products.needHelpDescription: Our safety experts are here to help you choose the right protection equipment for your specific needs and industry requirements.

categories.head: Head Protection
categories.headDescription: Professional helmets, hard hats, and head protection equipment designed to protect against impact, electrical hazards, and falling objects.
categories.eyeFaceDescription: Safety glasses, goggles, face shields, and protective eyewear for complete eye and face protection in industrial environments.
categories.hearingDescription: Ear plugs, ear muffs, and advanced hearing protection solutions to prevent noise-induced hearing loss in the workplace.
categories.respiratoryDescription: Respirators, face masks, breathing apparatus, and air filtration systems for protection against airborne hazards.
categories.handDescription: Cut-resistant gloves, chemical-resistant gloves, and specialized hand protection for various industrial applications.
categories.bodyDescription: High-visibility vests, coveralls, aprons, and protective clothing designed to shield workers from workplace hazards.
categories.footDescription: Safety boots, steel-toe shoes, slip-resistant footwear, and specialized protective footwear for various work environments.
categories.gasDetectorsDescription: Advanced gas detection equipment, monitors, and sensors to identify and measure hazardous gases in the workplace.
